overview: Motivational speaker and self-help phenomenon Anthony Robbins brings his magic touch to the world of love and romance, describing strategies that help you form habits and mind-sets that allow you and your partner to bring out the best in each other. Robbins has worked with more than 3 million people from 80 countries and has incorporated his findings about relationships into this exciting program, which he created with his wife, Sage.
title: Anthony Robbins: Love & Passion
